p: The euthanasia procedure was completed after the animals were deprived of food for 12â€‰h via physical method (decapitation) and all procedures performed were done according to the American Veterinary Medical Association (AVMA Guidelines for the Euthanasia of Animals: 2013 Edition) and Rules of laboratory practice approved by Order of the Ministry of Health of the Russian Federation No. 193n of 01/01/2016.
